hr.strong: RHPCS Update to COVID - 19 as of March 13, 2020

br.div: Rolling Hills School Board, Administration, and staff are taking the COVID - 19 situation very seriously. An emergency response team met today to determine our increased response to the emerging situation and potential school closure. All decisions are grounded in official recommendations from the Governor's Office, Idaho State Department of Education and the CDC. We are communicating this to you so you can plan for your family, but realize this is an emerging situation. Watch for updates via e-mail or on our school website: www.rhpcs.org
For the full story, go to: https://www.rhpcs.org/apps/news/show_news.jsp?REC_ID=620202&id=0
